hero.title: Never overpay abroad again.
hero.description: Stop doing mental math abroad. Point your camera at any price tag, menu, or receipt and get instant currency conversions. No typing, no confusion—just accurate prices in your currency.

features.title: Everything you need to shop confidently abroad
features.description: Powerful features designed to make international travel stress-free and budget-friendly.

scan.title: Scan in Seconds
scan.description: Point, scan, done. No typing, no manual entry. Get instant currency conversions from any price tag, menu, or receipt in under 2 seconds.

private.title: 100% Private & Secure
private.description: Your photos never leave your device. All processing happens locally on your phone—no cloud, no servers, no data collection.

translation.title: Smart Translation
translation.description: Not just currency conversion—translate price labels and descriptions too. Understand exactly what you're buying, in any language.

save.title: Save & Compare
save.description: Save prices as you shop to compare later. Perfect for finding the best deals across different stores or planning your travel budget.

share.title: Share Instantly
share.description: Share converted prices with travel companions instantly. Great for splitting bills, group shopping, or showing friends back home.

widgets.title: Widgets & Quick Access
widgets.description: Check exchange rates without opening the app. Home screen and lock screen widgets keep you informed at a glance.

testimonials.title: Built for travelers, by travelers
testimonials.description: Everything you need to shop confidently and save money abroad

private.title: 100% Private
private.description: All processing happens on your device. Your photos never leave your phone.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Get instant conversions in under 2 seconds. No waiting, no delays.

currencies.title: 150+ Currencies
currencies.description: Works with all major currencies worldwide. Convert anywhere you travel.

noAccount.title: No Account Required
noAccount.description: Start using immediately. No sign-up, no email, no personal data collected.

pricing.title: Free forever. Premium features coming soon.
pricing.description: Get all essential features free. Premium unlocks ad-free experience and AI-powered enhancements.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about CurrenSee

scanning.question: How does the price scanning work?
scanning.answer: Simply point your camera at any price tag, menu, or receipt. Our app uses advanced OCR (Optical Character Recognition) to detect prices and instantly converts them to your preferred currency using real-time exchange rates.

internet.question: Do I need an internet connection?
internet.answer: The app works best with an internet connection for real-time exchange rates. However, you can save exchange rates for offline use, and basic scanning features work offline once the app is loaded.

privacy.question: Is my data private and secure?
privacy.answer: Absolutely! All image processing happens directly on your device. We never send your photos or scanned data to our servers. Your privacy is our top priority—100% of the processing is done locally on your phone.

currencies.question: Which currencies are supported?
currencies.answer: CurrenSee supports over 150 currencies worldwide, including all major currencies like USD, EUR, GBP, JPY, CNY, and many more. You can convert between any supported currencies.

free.question: Is the app really free?
free.answer: Yes! The app is completely free to download and use. The free version includes all core features: price scanning, currency conversion, label translation, and price saving. There are optional ads, but they don't interfere with the core functionality.

account.question: Can I use it without creating an account?
account.answer: Yes! CurrenSee works completely without requiring an account. Just download, open, and start scanning. No sign-up, no email, no hassle.

rates.question: How accurate are the exchange rates?
rates.answer: We use real-time exchange rates from reliable financial data providers. Rates are updated frequently throughout the day to ensure accuracy. Note that actual conversion rates may vary slightly when you make purchases, as banks and payment processors may apply their own fees.

countries.question: Does it work in all countries?
countries.answer: Yes! CurrenSee works anywhere in the world. As long as you can see a price tag, menu, or receipt, you can scan and convert it. The app supports prices in any language and format.

cta.title: Start saving money on your next trip
cta.description: Download free now—no account, no credit card, just instant currency conversion. Join smart travelers who never overpay abroad.

getUpdates.title: Be the first to know
getUpdates.description: Get notified when we launch new features, improvements, and updates. We'll only email you when there's something worth sharing.

emailSignup.successMessage: You're all set! We'll notify you about updates.
